titleStmt.title: The case of the governour and company of merchants of London, trading to the East-Indies, humbly represented to the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, in Parliament assembled.
titleStmt.author: East India Company.
Blackborne, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Robert Blackborne, secretary.
Identified on film as Wing C1082 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
